response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $1,350,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
